action.action-desc: Mr. Walz (for himself, Mr. Jones, Mr. Gibson, Miss Rice of New York, Mr. Nolan, and Mr. Takano) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, and the Agent Orange Act of 1991 to extend the certain authorities of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs regarding associations between diseases and exposure to dioxin and other chemical compounds in herbicides.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Agent Orange Extension Act of 2015.

section.header: Extension of certain authorities of Secretary of Veterans Affairs regarding associations between diseases and exposure to dioxin and other chemical compounds in herbicides

subsection.header: Use of information To provide for presumption of service connection
subsection.text: Section 1116(e) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking September 30, 2015 and inserting September 30, 2017.

subsection.header: Agreement with National Academy of Sciences
subsection.text: Section 3(i) of the Agent Orange Act of 1991 (Public Law 102–4; 38 U.S.C. 1116 note) is amended by striking December 31, 2015 and inserting December 31, 2017.
